of Super Bowl vision in Texas Speaking at his annual Super Bowl news conference on Friday, the commissioner said he's spoken with Michael Vick three times in the last two weeks about his plans. I want to make sure that he doesn't put himself in a position where he's going to make bad decisions or bad things can happen around him, Roger Goodell said. "He takes that seriously also." , Wayne Jeffrey White says. No matter what happens now, things have changed irrevocably in Egypt, says David Schenker, a Middle East adviser to former Defense secretary Donald Rumsfeld .
